headline: Uber, Lucid and Nuro Begin On-Road Testing for Robotaxi Service
summary: Pending final validation, the robotaxi is expected to start production later this year. The companies expect to offer the service in the Bay Area later this year.

headline: Lucid, Nuro, and Uber Unveil Global Robotaxi at CES, Announce Autonomous On-Road Testing
summary: Lucid Group, Inc. (NASDAQ: LCID), Nuro, Inc. ("Nuro"), and Uber Technologies, Inc. (NYSE: UBER), today unveiled the production intent vehicles that will be used in their global robotaxi service and introduced the Uber-designed in-cabin rider experience for the first time at the Consumer Electronics Show (CES) 2026.

headline: NVIDIA Announces Alpamayo Family of Open-Source AI Models and Tools to Accelerate Safe, Reasoning-Based Autonomous Vehicle Development
summary: NVIDIA Alpamayo NVIDIA Alpamayo is a family of open-source VLA models, datasets and simulation frameworks enabling reasoning-based level 4 autonomy. News Summary: NVIDIA is the first to release an open reasoning VLA model designed to tackle long-tail autonomous driving challenges; NVIDIA Alpamayo family also includes simulation tools and datasets for AV development.Alpamayo 1, AlpaSim and Physical AI Open Datasets enable the development of vehicles that perceive, reason and act with humanlike ju

headline: Uber Stock Is Cut to Sell as Robo-Taxi Competition Heats Up
summary: Uber Technologies  shareholders should take that as their cue to sell, one firm says.  Melius Research downgraded  Uber  stock to Sell from Hold and slashed its price target to $73 from $100 in a research note Monday, citing the competitive risks posed by autonomous vehicles, or AVs.  Uber stock fell 3% to $80.39 on Monday.

headline: This Put Option Pays Off If Uber Stock Fails To Pick Up
summary: Shares of rideshare giant Uber had a rocky end to 2025, despite the company reporting record revenue and earnings results.  Investors who anticipate further weakness in Uber stock may consider buying a put option.  With only fourth-quarter results still to be reported, Uber is expecting earnings per share of $5.37 in 2025, a solid increase of 18% from $4.56 per share in 2024.

headline: A Look At Uber Technologies (UBER) Valuation As AV Competition Spurs A Melius Research Downgrade
summary: Uber Technologies (UBER) shares slipped 1.2% after Melius Research cut its rating to Sell, highlighting rising competitive risks from autonomous vehicle players such as Waymo and Baidu and questioning the durability of Uber’s growth profile. See our latest analysis for Uber Technologies. That downgrade lands after a tougher few months for the stock, with a 30 day share price return of 9.26% decline and a 90 day share price return of 15.28% decline, even though the 1 year total shareholder...

headline: Uber stock falls after Melius downgrade to Sell
summary: Investing.com -- Uber Technologies Inc. (NYSE:UBER) stock fell 1.2% Monday morning following a downgrade from Melius Research to Sell from Hold, with a price target of $73 that suggests further downside from the recent closing price of $81.71.
